version_description:
Various system optimisations for the new iOS version, app performance enhancements and technical fixes.

We will always push out new update to enhance our services and to provide more comprehensive features to you. If you find any difficulty or problem with the app, please contact us directly through email or our official website at indodax.com.

Real-time Market Feature at Indodax Trading Platform iOS App!
With this feature, you will be able to gain access to real-time market data and transaction directly from this app.

This update is a major update addressing various critical technical issues and improvements for the latest iOS version.
Minor fix on External Market display feature

Roses are red
Violets are blue
Are you ready to trade?
We have the updates for you!

With a new logo, Indodax mobile app comes with the newest updates, Finance which lets you do:

1. Deposit and Withdraw at IDR exchange rates
2. Sending and Receiving Coins
3. Sending and Receiving Vouchers.

Others:
1. Fully support IOS 13 & 12
2. Finance menu
3. Widget dynamic theme
4. Various bug fixes
5. Major improvement

Update your Indodax application to version 2.1.0 now and start trading easily all on your phone.

Update your Indodax application to version 2.1.1 now and start trading easily all on your phone.
Beberapa perbaikan bug, dan peningkatan performa app

- fix too many request error
- fix crash
